Text:
Translation: 

This true story reveals the details of the rise and fall of the notorious union representative Danny Greene (Ray Stevenson), who gained fame in the mid 70s for his bold willingness to defy the Italian mafia. 
Raised in the streets of Cleveland, the tough reputation of Greene finally got him in contact with the local mafia. It was not long before the local mafia became a great enforcer in the region. 
After forming an alliance with the notorious gangster John Nardi (Vincent D Onofrio â‚¬ â„¢) and the dreaded Shondor Birns (Christopher Walken), 
Greene begins to discover that he himself has the potential to be as powerful as his opponents. 
Pretty soon he develops a reputation as untouchable after surviving numerous assassination attempts and creates a deadly  organization with crime syndicates across America.
